feeds.title: XKCD
feeds.description: Famous webcomic amongst science types. Literally every science degree person I know loves it.

feeds.title: Poorly Drawn Lines
feeds.description: A webcomic with humor and wit.

feeds.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast
feeds.description: A webcomic with a mix of science, philosophy, and humor.

starterPacks.name: Tech News
starterPacks.description: Stay up-to-date with the latest technology news and developments

feeds.title: Hackaday
feeds.description: They track the random cool DIY and FOSS projects people make and 3D print

feeds.title: Wired Magazine - Business
feeds.description: Business-related articles from Wired Magazine. **Note**: You can subscribe to wired's all articles feed, but it is too full of affiliate marketting slop so I prefer to select a couple individual feeds.

feeds.title: Wired Magazine - AI
feeds.description: AI-related articles from Wired Magazine. **Note**: You can subscribe to wired's all articles feed, but it is too full of affiliate marketting slop so I prefer to select a couple individual feeds.

feeds.title: Wired Magazine - Backchannel
feeds.description: Longform articles from Wired Magazine. **Note**: You can subscribe to wired's all articles feed, but it is too full of affiliate marketting slop so I prefer to select a couple individual feeds.

feeds.title: 404 Media
feeds.description: Random software news, lotsa cybersec and hacker kinda stuff

starterPacks.name: AI News
starterPacks.description: I really like keeping up with the specifics in current ML research. These are my favourite feeds.

feeds.title: Simon Wilson's Weblog
feeds.description: He is a researcher at Mozilla and pretty smart

feeds.title: ByCloudAI
feeds.description: He is a youtuber, who also runs a weekly newsletter, the newsletter recaps 3 new papers on AI research every week.

feeds.title: Nofill
feeds.description: Another guy's blog on AI shit

feeds.title: Vizuara
feeds.description: He writes about the very specifics and mathematics of LLMs/Diffusion Models

feeds.title: One Useful Thing
feeds.description: Insights and analysis on AI and its applications

feeds.title: DB Reunig
feeds.description: Blog on AI and related topics

starterPacks.name: Personal Blogs
starterPacks.description: Thoughtful blogs by individual writers on tech, science, and culture

feeds.title: Caffeine And Lasers
feeds.description: My longer posts about technology, science, and culture.

feeds.title: Pluralistic
feeds.description: Cory Doctorow's Blog. He writes an essay just about every day about big tech / politics

feeds.title: Dynomight
feeds.description: A "Rationalist" web blog. Lots of interesting science, posts about society and knowledge.

feeds.title: Jodie Ettenburg
feeds.description: Monthly Newsletter with collections of links to cool random spots on the web. E.g. [My Quest to Find the Owner of a Mysterious WWII Japanese Sword.](https://www.outsideonline.com/culture/essays-culture/world-war-ii-japanese-sword/)

feeds.title: Starbreaker
feeds.description: Friend of the site, he posts longform rants about tech, politics, and the state of the web.

feeds.title: Ava's Blog
feeds.description: She mostly blogs about her personal life, but she is a nice writer and has interesting opinions sometimes.

feeds.title: CheapSkates Guide
feeds.description: Talks about computers and the internet, and computing as cheaply as possible.

feeds.title: ShellSharks
feeds.description: Bigly into the 'IndieWeb' like me. Posts about CyberSec, technology and blogging. Super Groovy website as well. Look around his site not just the feed IMHO. He has a whole bunch of different feeds, but that one captures everything (I think)

feeds.title: Citation Needed
feeds.description: Molly White's Blog. She mostly writes longform about Crypto Grifts, but also occasionally about broader important internet things. She is a relatively important Wikipedia Contributor.

starterPacks.name: Australian News
starterPacks.description: News sources focused on Australian current events and investigative journalism.

feeds.title: The Daily Aus
feeds.description: Just a 5 minute read newsletter. Ad supported summary of what the current news is.

feeds.title: ABC News
feeds.description: Australia's National Broadcaster.

feeds.title: Michael West Media
feeds.description: Independent Journos. Great investigational journalism into Australian politics.

feeds.title: Independent Australia
feeds.description: Better political coverage than any mainstream journos. Also interesting niche topics covered by independent journos.
